thread.title: Mum halves her body size and loses 50kgs after pregnancy | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Mum halves her body size and loses 50kgs after pregnancy | Daily Mail Online

author: Anneta Konstantinides For Daily Mail Australia
title: Mum halves her body size and loses 50kgs after pregnancy | Daily Mail Online
text: 'I looked in the mirror and it was scary': Young mother who got through a LITRE of energy drink a day reveals she finally lost 50 kilos by eating MORE Alicia-Maree Beres tipped scale at 116 kgs before starting weight loss journey First started packing on weight at 18, gained another 8kg after daughter's birth Had been drinking litre of energy drinks a day, only eating takeaway or pizza Joined Weight Watchers and started eating three healthy meals a day Now sees a personal trainer so she can become toned and strong, not just skinny Published: 02:10 GMT, 10 February 2017 | Updated: 02:10 GMT, 10 February 2017 250 shares
